item.title: 独家：消息人士称中国最快下月推出液化天然气期货
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国最快将于下月推出境内上市、以人民币计价的液化天然气期货合约，此举将降低进口商在对冲价格波动时对西方的依赖。【原文：China is set to offer domestic-listed, yuan-denominated liquefied natural gas (LNG) futures contracts as soon as next month, people with knowledge of the matter said, reducing importer reliance on the West when hedging against price moves.】

item.title: 投资者对越南改革表示欢迎，但杜林的增长目标似乎难以实现
item.description: 经济学家和分析师表示，他提出的在被称为"市场列宁主义"的模式下实现两位数增长的目标，看起来并不现实。【原文：Economists and analysts say his goal of double-digit growth under a model that has been called "market Leninism" looks unrealistic.】

item.title: 英国零售销售意外增长，进一步显示经济复苏迹象
item.description: 英国上月零售额意外增长，得益于强劲的线上销售。周五公布的数据显示，财政大臣瑞秋·里夫斯公布预算案后，经济复苏迹象进一步显现。【原文：British retail sales rose unexpectedly last month, helped by strong online sales, according to data published on Friday which added to signs of a pickup in the economy after finance minister Rachel Reeves' budget.】

item.title: 爱立信利润超出市场预期，计划回购17亿美元股票
item.description: 瑞典电信设备制造商爱立信周五表示，计划通过股票回购向股东返还150亿瑞典克朗（约合17亿美元），此前该公司公布的季度营业利润超出市场预期。【原文：Swedish telecoms gear maker Ericsson said it planned to return 15 billion Swedish crowns ($1.7 billion) to shareholders through share repurchases as it beat quarterly operating earnings expectations on Friday.】

item.title: 地缘政治分析在投资者中日益受到重视，因风险不断累积
item.description: 随着资产管理公司和企业投资者寻求如何将战争、领土挑衅和全球政治风险纳入定价的最佳方式，对地缘政治分析的需求正在上升。【原文：Demand for geopolitical analysis is rising, as asset managers and corporate investors seek guidance on the best way to price in risk from wars, territorial saber-rattling and global political risk.】

item.title: 美国对委内瑞拉石油的控制可能引发与中国债务重组的对峙
item.description: 美国对委内瑞拉石油出口的管控已将本用于偿还中国债务的石油卷入其中，这为两大超级大国之间可能爆发的又一场对峙埋下伏笔，或将使这个南美国家摆脱债务违约困境的道路更加复杂。【原文：U.S. control of Venezuela's oil exports has ensnared barrels that had been servicing debt to China, lining up another potential showdown between the two superpowers that could further complicate the South American country's path out of default.】

item.title: 早盘竞价：特朗普北极闹剧令美元寒意袭人
item.description: 汤姆·韦斯特布鲁克带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 马来西亚解除对Grok AI的封禁，因X平台已实施安全措施
item.description: 马来西亚通信监管机构周五表示，在社交媒体平台X实施额外安全措施后，该国用户已恢复访问Grok功能。【原文：Malaysia has restored access to Grok for its users after social media platform X implemented additional safety measures, its communications regulator said on Friday.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，在与华纳的竞争加剧之际，奈飞称派拉蒙的报价"经不起推敲"
item.description: 据《金融时报》周五报道，奈飞联合首席执行官格雷格·彼得斯表示，该公司收购华纳兄弟探索公司影视制作部门的827亿美元要约正按计划推进，有望获得股东支持。他同时指出派拉蒙的竞购方案"经不起推敲"。【原文：Netflix co-chief executive Greg Peters said the company is on track to win the backing of Warner Bros Discovery shareholders for its $82.7 billion offer for the company's film and television studios, adding that Paramount's rival bid "doesn't pass the sniff test", the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 《金融时报》报道称，Revolut放弃收购美国贷款机构的计划，转而寻求独立牌照。
item.description: 据《金融时报》周五报道，知情人士透露，英国Revolut公司已放弃收购美国贷款机构的计划，转而申请美国银行牌照。【原文：Britain's Revolut has scrapped plans to buy a U.S. lender and will instead apply for an American banking licence, Financial Times reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普获赠新款凯迪拉克座驾，空军一号专机即将启程
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普正在获得新的交通工具——陆地和空中都有。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is getting new transportation - on the ground and in the sky.】

item.title: 建筑科技公司EquipmentShare.com在美国IPO中筹集约7.47亿美元
item.description: 建筑科技公司EquipmentShare.com周四在美国首次公开募股定价区间内完成定价，筹集资金7.473亿美元，凸显了初创企业寻求公开市场融资的强劲需求。【原文：Construction tech firm EquipmentShare.com priced its U.S. initial public offering within its indicated range on Thursday, ​raising $747.3 million and underscoring strong demand for startups looking ‌to tap public markets.】

item.title: 日本央行如预期维持利率不变，上调经济增长与通胀预期
item.description: 日本央行周五维持利率不变，同时上调了经济和通胀预期，表明其准备继续提高目前仍处于低位的借贷成本。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept interest rates steady on Friday and raised its economic and inflation forecasts, signalling its readiness to continue hiking still-low borrowing costs.】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率不变，上调经济增长与通胀预期
item.description: 日本央行周五维持利率不变，同时上调了经济和通胀预期，表明其准备继续提高目前仍处于低位的借贷成本。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept interest rates steady on Friday and raised its economic and inflation forecasts, signalling its readiness to continue hiking still-low borrowing costs.】

item.title: 油价反弹，因特朗普关于"舰队"驶向伊朗的言论引发供应担忧
item.description: 油价周五反弹，此前美国总统唐纳德·特朗普再度对中东主要产油国伊朗发出威胁，引发市场担忧军事行动可能导致供应中断。【原文：Oil prices rebounded on Friday after U.S. President Donald Trump renewed threats against major Middle Eastern producer Iran, raising concerns of military action that could disrupt supplies.】

item.title: 亚洲股市小幅上涨，日本央行利率决议前夕
item.description: 周五亚洲早盘股市小幅上涨，日本央行即将召开最新政策会议，市场普遍预期其将维持利率不变。【原文：Stocks made tepid gains in early Asian trading on Friday ahead of the Bank of Japan's latest policy meeting, at which it is widely expected to keep rates on hold.】

item.title: 美元料创一年来最差单周表现，日元在日银决议前承压
item.description: 在特朗普总统对格陵兰岛的威胁及其突然转变令投资者感到不安后，美元正准备创下一年来最大单周跌幅；而日元在周五稍晚日本央行政策决定公布前，在接近一周低点附近徘徊。【原文：The U.S. dollar was poised for its biggest weekly drop in a year after President Donald Trump's Greenland threats and abrupt reversal unnerved investors, while the yen wobbled near one-week lows ahead of the Bank of Japan policy decision later on Friday.】

item.title: TikTok达成协议成立美国新合资企业以规避禁令
item.description: TikTok的中国母公司字节跳动周四敲定协议，将成立一家美国控股的合资企业，以规避美国对这款社交媒体应用的禁令。该应用拥有超过2亿美国用户。【原文：TikTok's Chinese owner, ByteDance, finalized a deal on Thursday to set up a majority American-owned joint venture company to avoid a U.S. ban on the popular social media app used by more than 200 million Americans.】

item.title: 日本制造业活动时隔七个月重回增长轨道，PMI数据显示
item.description: 日本制造业活动在1月份实现七个月来首次扩张，私营部门调查显示，这得益于新出口订单创下四年多来最大增幅。【原文：Japan's manufacturing activity expanded in January for the first time in seven months, buoyed by the biggest rise in new export orders in more than four years, a private-sector survey showed.】

item.title: 特朗普对顾问提出的开放401(k)计划用于购房的方案"不太热衷"
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周四表示，他不赞成允许民众动用401(k)退休金作为购房首付款，尽管这一提议是由他自己的首席经济顾问凯文·哈塞特提出的。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump ​on Thursday said he does not like the idea of letting people use ‌401(k) retirement funds for a down payment on a house, even though it was floated by his own chief economic adviser, Kevin Hassett.】

item.title: Bitwise与Proficio Capital Partners联合推出的ETF瞄准黄金、金属及比特币，作为货币的替代投资选择
item.description: 随着地缘政治紧张局势加剧及多国政府债务负担加重，数字资产投资公司Bitwise与佛罗里达州某家族办公室旗下机构Proficio Capital Partners正推出一款交易所交易基金，旨在投资美元及其他货币的替代资产，涵盖黄金至比特币等多种标的。【原文：As geopolitical tensions soar and government debt loads rise in many nations, digital assets investment firm Bitwise and ​Proficio Capital Partners, a division of a Florida-based multi-family ‌office, are rolling out an exchange-traded fund designed to invest in alternatives to the dollar and other currencies, ranging from gold to bitcoin.】

item.title: 日本12月核心通胀增速放缓，但仍高于日本央行目标
item.description: 数据显示，日本核心消费者通胀在截至12月的年度内有所放缓，但仍高于央行2%的目标，这使得市场对未来加息的预期依然存在。【原文：Japan's core consumer inflation slowed in the year to December but stayed above the central bank's 2% target, data showed on Friday, keeping alive market expectations of future interest rate rises.】

item.title: CSX因工业需求疲软、煤炭运输量下降而未达季度业绩预期
item.description: CSX周四公布的第四季度营收和利润低于市场预期，因工业需求疲软及出口煤炭量下降抵消了价格上涨和多式联运量增长带来的收益。【原文：CSX on Thursday reported fourth-quarter revenue and profit that fell short of market expectations, as weaker industrial demand ​and lower export coal volumes offset pricing gains ‌and stronger intermodal traffic.】

item.title: 新上市的ETF追踪最受散户投资者青睐的美国股票
item.description: Defiance ETFs与Futurum Equities周四联合宣布，共同推出一款新型交易所交易基金，旨在为个人投资者提供股票投资渠道。该基金聚焦于两家公司认为最受个人投资者青睐的股票——这一群体在美国股市中的影响力正日益增强。【原文：Defiance ETFs and Futurum Equities have jointly launched a new exchange-traded fund aimed ‌at providing exposure to stocks that they believe are of greatest interest to individual investors, a group that is an increasingly significant force in the U.S. stock market, the two firms said Thursday.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空对燃油成本和经济风险作出谨慎预测
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空周四预测，受季节性因素、燃油价格波动及经济不确定性影响，其第一季度亏损将超出预期，全年盈利前景亦低于华尔街预期。【原文：Alaska Airlines on Thursday ​forecast a wider-than-expected first-quarter loss and a full-year profit outlook below Wall Street estimates, citing seasonality, ‌fuel-price volatility and economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 交易日：万岁！"TACO"交易
item.description: 周四全球股市大幅上涨，因美国总统特朗普就格陵兰岛达成协议框架，并撤回对多个欧洲国家加征关税的威胁，同时投资者对美国强劲的经济数据表示欢迎。【原文：World stocks leaped on Thursday after U.S. President Donald Trump agreed a framework of a deal on Greenland and withdrew his threat to slap new tariffs on several European nations, while investors also cheered upbeat U.S. economic data.】

item.title: 直觉外科公司因手术机器人需求强劲，季度业绩超预期
item.description: 直觉外科公司周四公布的第四季度利润和营收超出华尔街预期，这得益于其用于微创手术的机器人需求持续增长。【原文：Intuitive Surgical on Thursday beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit and revenue on growing demand for ​its surgical robots used in minimally invasive procedures.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称亚马逊计划下周再裁数千名企业员工
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，亚马逊计划下周启动第二轮裁员，作为其削减约3万名企业员工的更广泛目标的一部分。【原文：Amazon is planning a second round of job cuts next week as part of its broader goal of trimming some 30,000 corporate workers, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米·戴蒙2025年薪酬将升至4300万美元
item.description: 摩根大通周四表示，其长期首席执行官杰米·戴蒙2025年的薪酬方案上涨约10%，达到4300万美元。【原文：JPMorgan Chase said on Thursday its longtime CEO Jamie Dimon's 2025 pay package climbed about 10% to $43 million.】

item.title: 约翰迪尔首席财务官约书亚·杰普森将加入霍尼韦尔航空航天部门
item.description: 农业设备制造商迪尔公司周四在提交的文件中宣布，其首席财务官约书亚·杰普森将于2月19日正式离职。【原文：Farm equipment maker Deere & Co's chief financial officer, Joshua Jepsen, will resign from the position effective February 19, the company said in a filing on Thursday.】
